name: xob-cat
description: XO Bot Conversation Analysis Tools - Full-stack web app for chatbot session analysis

scripts.stop: npm run stop:frontend && npm run stop:backend
scripts.status: npm run status:backend && npm run status:frontend
scripts.status:frontend: curl -sf http://localhost:3000 || echo '❌ Frontend is not responding'
scripts.status:backend: curl -sf http://localhost:3001/health || echo '❌ Backend is not responding'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
